message.body: , do you ever have dreams with mom in them?
No i use to. Do u?
Very very rarely but I just woke up from one. It always shakes me up.
U know they communicate thru dreams. Richie had a dream with her long one ago. N she told him its ok n everything was gonna be ok n to tell everyone she loves
them. N she gave him a Hugo
I remember. That was so nice. I wish mine were like that. Mine are just weird.
I wish I had them like that. When I have it hem they r bad dreams like I'm reliving it

Alright. So/so. Working to keep my house together once again. Older homes are such a pain in the ass. ....especially financially. They are raising my property taxes a bunch also, which is annoying. Although Jersey taxes are way higher. One of the highest in the country if I'm not mistaken..
Yeah we r its crazy. N my taxes r going up too. Think to close to 8k year. It's fucking ridiculous. When the weather gets warmer we wanna come visit.
